title: Select the risk-free proxy for tables and charts in web-based Direct
text:
When analyzing funds in an Investment Workbook, you can select the cash proxy in order to have an appropriate representation of cash when using Modern Portfolio Theory statistics such as Alpha, Beta, Correlation, Sharpe Ratio, and more.

Note: Users also have the option to select No Risk-Free Proxy.

The following components offer the Risk-Free Proxy as a setting in the Component Settings menu:

Performance Analysis

Scatter Plot

Rolling Time Series

Holdings Plot, and

Correlation Matrix.

Note: In the Performance Analysis table, change the Data Points setting to Risk and Return in order to see the Risk-Free Proxy setting. In the Scatter Plot and Holdings Plot charts, change the X Axis or Y Axis values to an MPT statistic to see the Risk-Free Proxy setting.

Note the value that must be chosen for the Data Points setting in order to see this option
